entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
